mapper.select: SELECT combo_id, combo_name, effective_length, start_time, end_time, money, p.id AS 'project_id', b.NAME AS 'manager_name', p.NAME AS 'project_name' FROM pay_combo a LEFT JOIN manager_info b ON (a.manager_id = b.id) LEFT JOIN project_info p ON (a.project_id = p.id) WHERE a.combo_id not IN (0,1)
SELECT id,effective_length,bf_combo_name as 'combo_name' ,bf_money as 'money',alter_time FROM log_pay_combo WHERE combo_id=#{combo_id} order by alter_time desc LIMIT 6
